entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
